Using [Google Trends](https://trends.google.com/trends/) data on the search volume for various terms, we can investigate the general interest over time. Google Trends is an unbiased sample of Google search data. Itâ€™s anonymised, categorized and aggregated. For the regions we are looking at - Europe, North, Central and South America - the [percentage of population](https://www.internetworldstats.com/) that uses the internet is 88%, 95%, 61% and 72% respectively. This indicates that the search patterns shown by Google Trends may be an accurate representation of the behaviors and interests of people.
